elements.text:
You go to your parents' home for the first time in a while and notice that your father looks a lot less healthy than you remember. Neither one of your parents mentions anything about his health. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

text: I feel thrilled that my father is engaging in conversation.
I am grateful to be able to spend time with my father.
I start to feel angry about how he is getting older, but know that this is a part of life and I cannot change it.
I'm uneasy about my father's appearance.
I feel anxious and start to overthink what could be wrong, but remember I can't control his health.
